instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1398 Restarts After Password Logged In
threads.message:
I have my customer’s computer which restarts after we put the password and press enter. It restarts again and again after I put the password but after several restart it logges in.
Where should I start looking at?
Thank you

threads.title: A1398 Restarts After Password Logged In
threads.message:
What is the MLB code?
Does it have discrete graphics?
Did you try starting in safe mode?

threads.title: A1398 Restarts After Password Logged In
threads.message:
The MLB code is 820-3332-A
There is a discrete graphics
What I found out is the diagnostic mode is not starting with “D” key. It gives an cannot load testsupport.efi error
The headphone jack has a problem it does not recognise the headphones. It recognise always as a optical speaker.
and the battery been replaced. I am not sure but I think when the battery been connected it starts the fans full speed. This problem can be caused because of battery?
We did a clean mac os restore but still doing the same by the way.
When it restarts after we put the password and hit enter it restarts itself for 2- 5 times then let us to log in.

threads.title: A1398 Restarts After Password Logged In
threads.message:
Test with original battery.
I saw very weird issues caused by chinese batteries on these machines.

Just in case, try known good BIOS, clean ME.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1w8O3hakFxoJ0aHs_FqBxVsuJlKx63ItX/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

threads.title: A1398 Restarts After Password Logged In
threads.message: One more question we had the same problem without battery plugged in so can we still say it is still can be the battery?

threads.title: A1398 Restarts After Password Logged In
threads.message: You should be able to load macOS without battery.
